Achievements.Name: Ready for More
Achievements.Description: Complete all campaign Acts on Casual or Normal Difficulty (Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: Ain't My First Rodeo
Achievements.Description: Complete all campaign Acts on Hardcore Difficulty (Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: That's Just Crazy
Achievements.Description: Complete all campaign Acts on Insane Difficulty (Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: Collector
Achievements.Description: Recover 5 Campaign Collectibles (any difficulty, Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: Pack Rat
Achievements.Description: Recover 20 Campaign Collectibles (any difficulty, Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: Hoarder
Achievements.Description: Recover all 42 Campaign Collectibles (any difficulty, Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: Remember the Fallen
Achievements.Description: Recover all 15 COG Tags during the Campaign (any difficulty, Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: My Fellow Gears
Achievements.Description: Complete all Campaign Acts in Co-op (any difficulty, Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: We Few, We Happy Few...
Achievements.Description: Complete all Campaign Acts in 4 player Co-op (any difficulty, Standard or Arcade).

Achievements.Name: Level 5
Achievements.Description: Reach level 5.

Achievements.Name: Level 10
Achievements.Description: Reach level 10.

Achievements.Name: Level 15
Achievements.Description: Reach level 15.

Achievements.Name: Level 25
Achievements.Description: Reach level 25.

Achievements.Name: Level 50
Achievements.Description: Reach level 50.

Achievements.Name: Judge, Jury and Executioner
Achievements.Description: Get a kill with every possible execution finishing move (any mode).

Achievements.Name: Wreaking Locust Vengence
Achievements.Description: Get a kill with every Locust monster in Beast mode (any difficulty).

Achievements.Name: Enriched and Fortified
Achievements.Description: Complete all 50 waves of Horde mode (any difficulty, any map).

Achievements.Name: It's All About the Loot!
Achievements.Description: Earn the Bronze "Loot Courtesan" medal.

Achievements.Name: All for One, One for All
Achievements.Description: Earn the Bronze "Force Multiplier" medal.

Achievements.Name: First Among Equals
Achievements.Description: Earn the Silver "Number 1" medal.

Achievements.Name: Award Winning Tactics
Achievements.Description: Earn at least one Onyx medal.

Achievements.Name: Seriously 3.0
Achievements.Description: Reach level 100 and earn every Onyx medal.

Achievements.Name: Welcome to Versus
Achievements.Description: Kill 10 enemies in Team Deathmatch (Standard or Casual).

Achievements.Name: The Versus Sampler Platter
Achievements.Description: Complete one match of all six Versus game modes (Standard or Casual).

Achievements.Name: Welcome to Horde Mode
Achievements.Description: Survive the first 10 waves of Horde mode (any difficulty, any map).

Achievements.Name: Welcome to Beast Mode
Achievements.Description: Survive all 12 waves of Beast mode (any difficulty, any map).

Achievements.Name: Welcome to Arcade Mode
Achievements.Description: Complete 5 Arcade Campaign chapters in co-op (any difficulty).

Achievements.Name: Welcome to the Big Leagues
Achievements.Description: Demonstrate your skill in Casual Versus multiplayer.

Achievements.Name: Wait, What Time is it?
Achievements.Description: Earn the maximum Consecutive Match Bonus in Versus multiplayer (Standard or Casual).

Achievements.Name: Lambency
Achievements.Description: Execute an Epic employee, or someone who already has Lambency, in Versus multiplayer (any mode).

Achievements.Name: Socialite
Achievements.Description: Earn the Onyx "War Supporter" medal.

Achievements.Name: Respect for the Dead
Achievements.Description: Your respect for the dead earned you access to Griffin's special weapons stash.
